title: Walking together; Talkin' business; Making things right
creator_credit: Lew Griffiths and Council for Aboriginal Reconciliation
brief_description: These three programs and a kit aim to support the Council of Aboriginal Reconciliation’s vision for a united Australia “which respects this land of ours; values Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander heritage and provides justice and equity for all.” ‘Walking together’ and ‘Talkin’ Business’ highlights the aims and operation of the Council and ‘Making things right’ discusses the implications of the Mabo decision.
